info.brief_description:
A Naruto shrink and vore story~
GIFT POINTS for good additions~
info.description:
You are 17 year old Brendon. You wake up tiny and you don't remember what happened to you.

*=Rules=*
Only male characters, There is enough female only stuff on here.
Don't END a chapter line unless there is nothing left to do.
No half assed chapters. Stuff like
"he eats u and u die in his stumac, teh end" will be deleted.



**~I will give GIFT POINTS to people who write good chapters~**

Thats all~
HAVE FUN~ ^.^
